SEARCH
程序包 org.bupt.persosnalfinance.dto

类 SpendingRecord

java.lang.Object
org.bupt.persosnalfinance.dto.SpendingRecord
public class SpendingRecord extends Object
A record of spending for a specific budget category. Contains both the user's actual spending and the AI-provided budget.

  • 构造器概要

    Constructs a SpendingRecord with the specified values.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SpendingRecord

      public SpendingRecord(String category, double actualSpending, double aiBudget)
      Constructs a SpendingRecord with the specified values.
      参数:
      category - the name of the budget category
      actualSpending - the actual spending amount in this category
      aiBudget - the budget amount recommended by AI

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCategory

      public String getCategory()
      Gets the budget category name.
      返回:
      the category name

    • getActualSpending

      public double getActualSpending()
      Gets the actual spending for this category.
      返回:
      the actual spending amount

    • getAiBudget

      public double getAiBudget()
      Gets the AI-generated budget for this category.
      返回:
      the budget amount recommended by AI

    • createFromMaps

      public static List<SpendingRecord> createFromMaps(Map<String,Double> actual, Map<String,Double> ai)
      Creates a list of SpendingRecord objects by merging two maps: one for actual spending and one for AI budgets. For each category in the AI map, retrieves the actual spending (defaulting to 0.0) and the AI budget, then constructs a record.
      参数:
      actual - a map from category name to actual spending amount
      ai - a map from category name to AI-generated budget amount
      返回:
      a list of SpendingRecord for each category in the AI map
